clinical_study.brief_title: Population Pharmacokinetics and Dosage Individualization of Antibiotics in Elderly Patients
clinical_study.official_title: Population Pharmacokinetics and Dosage Individualization of Biapenem,Meropenem,Piperacillin and Tazobactam,Tigecycline in Elderly Patients Who Was Hospitalized in Intensive Care Unit

collaborator.agency: The Second Hospital of Shandong University

brief_summary.textblock: The investigator's purpose is to study the pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics of biapenem,meropenem,piperacillin and tazobactam,tigecycline in elderly ICU patients and recommend an individual dosage regimen of those antibiotics.

detailed_description.textblock: The use of biapenem,meropenem,piperacillin and tazobactam,tigecycline in elderly ICU patients during clinical treatment depended mostly on experience. Besides, there was no recommended dose for elderly patients in drug instruction, Therefore, we aim to study the pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics in elderly ICU patients and provide a tailormade regimen.

primary_outcome.measure: The peak plasma drug concentration of biapenem,meropenem,piperacillin and tazobactam,tigecycline.
primary_outcome.description: To detect the peak plasma drug concentration of biapenem,meropenem,piperacillin and tazobactam,tigecycline after intravenous administration.

primary_outcome.measure: The random plasma drug concentration of biapenem,meropenem,piperacillin and tazobactam,tigecycline.
primary_outcome.description: To detect the random plasma and cerebrospinal fluid drug concentration of biapenem,meropenem,piperacillin and tazobactam,tigecycline after intravenous administration.

primary_outcome.measure: The trough plasma drug concentration of biapenem,meropenem,piperacillin and tazobactam,tigecycline.
primary_outcome.time_frame: at 1-2 hours before the next administration
primary_outcome.description: To detect the trough plasma drug concentration of biapenem,meropenem,piperacillin and tazobactam,tigecycline after intravenous administration.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an average of 14 days
Through study completion, an average of 14 days

arm_group.description: The use of antimicrobial agents depends on the clinical practice.

intervention.description: biapenem,meropenem,piperacillin and tazobactam,tigecycline extended infusion time or continuous infusion for 24 hours;Tigecycline changed standard does for treatment.

study_pop.textblock: Elderly ICU patients (≥65years）treated with biapenem,meropenem,piperacillin and tazobactam and tigecycline who was hospitalized in the Second Hospital of Shandong University.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- (1) Age ≥65 years old; (2) According to the doctor's advice, use biapenem,meropenem,piperacillin and tazobactam,tigecycline for anti-infection treatment;
Exclusion Criteria:
- (1) Patients who are expected to die within 48 hours; (2) Patients with allergic to β-lactam antibiotics, Carbapenems, and Ticacycline drugs; (3) Patients receiving other investigational drugs; (4) Other factors that the researcher considers unsuitable for inclusion.
